SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.controller.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LobbyControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class LobbyController extends Object implements Serializable, LobbyControllerInterface
The LobbyController class manages the creation and joining of game lobbies. It handles player registration, lobby creation, and lobby management.

    • joinGame

      public GameControllerInterface joinGame(String nickname, int numOfPlayers, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to join a game or creates a new game if necessary.
      Specified by:
      joinGame in interface LobbyControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname.
      numOfPlayers - the number of players in the game.
      listener - the GameListener for the player.
      Returns:
      the GameControllerInterface for the game the joined player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a network error.
